adverse-event.name: adverse event
adverse-event.definition: Any health problem that happens during the study one.
adverse-event.sentence: The study team needs to know about any adverse event that happens during the study.
adverse-event.more_info: Every health problem has to be tracked even if it is not related to the study treatment.
adverse-event.example: An example of an adverse event is catching a cold during the study.

adverse-reaction.name: adverse reaction
adverse-reaction.definition: A health problem that happens during the study and is possibly caused by the study treatment one edit.
adverse-reaction.sentence: Adverse reactions that happen in a study are health problems that might be caused by the study treatment.
adverse-reaction.more_info: Participants should tell the study team about any health problem that happens while they are in the study.
adverse-reaction.example: An example of an adverse reaction is a new rash after starting the study medication.

anonymize.name: anonymize
anonymize.definition: Remove, change, or hide personal details to protect participant privacy.
anonymize.sentence: When reporting study findings, the study team will anonymize research data so it is not possible to know who the participants are.
anonymize.more_info: Personal information such as name, birthdate, and address are removed. This means data collected during the study could not identify an individual.
